attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By letting turkey join the eu we would get much better trade links with the Former Russian Colonies and therefore cheaper gas and electric.

The bigger the coalition the bigger the influence on the world table.

Big is better for the UK industry as we will get access to much more competitive goods, raw materials and a population hungry for success.

We will also be helping Turkey get rid of it's undemocratic Influential Military who bring a dark cloud of Europe every time they slaughter the Democratically elected governments.

Please join me in Signing this petition and let the UK speak.

THANK YOU ALL.
